channel.title: GitHub Svelte Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Svelte in GitHub

item.title: saadeghi/daisyui
item.description: 🌼 🌼 🌼 🌼 🌼  The most popular, free and open-source Tailwind CSS component library

item.title: mistweaverco/bananas
item.description: Bananas🍌, Cross-Platform screen 🖥️ sharing 📡 made simple ⚡.

item.description: 💪🏻 Blazing-fast system monitoring for your desktop (built with Rust, Tauri & Svelte)

item.description: shadcn/ui, but for Svelte. ✨

item.title: dbgate/dbgate
item.description: Database manager for MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MongoDB, SQLite and others. Runs under Windows, Linux, Mac or as web application

item.title: themesberg/flowbite-svelte
item.description: Official Svelte components built for Flowbite and Tailwind CSS

item.title: techniq/layerchart
item.description: Composable Svelte chart components to build a large variety of visualizations

item.title: GoodiesHQ/headscale-admin
item.description: Admin Web Interface for juanfont/headscale

item.title: JacobLinCool/d1-manager
item.description: D1 Manager is a web UI and API for Cloudflare D1, a serverless SQL database. It provides a web interface for managing databases, tables, and records, as well as an AI assistant to help you write query in natural language.

item.title: SikandarJODD/svelte-animations
item.description: Svelte Magic UI, Svelte Aceternity UI, Svelte Components build using Tailwind CSS & Framer Motion

item.description: Stream anime torrents, real-time with no waiting for downloads

item.title: rajnandan1/kener
item.description: Stunning status pages, batteries included!

item.title: vkurko/calendar
item.description: Full-sized drag & drop JavaScript event calendar with resource & timeline views

item.title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui-lite
item.description: This repo is no longer maintained, please use our main Open WebUI repo.

item.title: Figma-Linux/figma-linux
item.description: Figma is the first interface design tool based in the browser, making it easier for teams to create software. Join us in https://t.me/figma_linux

item.title: ChurchApps/FreeShow
item.description: FreeShow is a free and open-source, user-friendly presenter software.
